pages.text: The Satchel is a bag that can hold things. It's pretty straightforward. Press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to toggle auto-collect mode, where items are automatically stored on pickup, depending on Filter restrictions. It can be augmented in the Tinker's Workbench.

pages.title: Satchel
pages.text: It can be dyed in a Crafting Table with any normal dyes, and/or secured with a Signalum Security Lock.
